item.title: Use AI or yourself/phone to create short video ads for Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!  You will use AI to create video ads for instagram ads.   Please READ everything below, before we talk on skype ( I always only pay here but I only use skype for us to communicate).  We will start with a test of 3 videos, (one of each a, b, c below) and then go from there.  This is a long term but PART TIME project.

I want you to use YOUR creativity and do what inspires you.  I will need videos that are:

a) 5-15 seconds
b) up to 30 seconds
c) up to 1 minute

For example, if you want to do the style of video that is more influencer, of you saying " hey guys check this out", etc.  Or if you want to just edit a video by hand, or take clips (copyright ok clips).  WHATEVER you want to do, do it.  Use your creativity!

***We want videos that could go viral so pay attention to videos on instagram that do go viral.

*** We want you to have fun!

We will do a trial run for a few video creatives and I will put you into a group.  I will post videos that I need made in the group and you can work on it in the time that you want with using the upwork time tracker only.

The IDEA is for you to be creative and do what inspires you.  

In the skype group I will post videos that are working well and everyone can learn together and share creativity.

I will give you the topic and words and some general things that the ads needs but YOU will do the rest.   We want to use your inspiration!

They will be the following specs:

Minimum resolution: 1080×1080 pixels.
Recommended ratio: 4:5.
Minimum width: 500 pixels.
Maximum file size: 4GB.
Video length: 1 second to 60 minutes.
Recommended video formats: MP4, MOV, GIF.
With Video captions
With Video sound

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 17:06 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Short Video Ad, Video Editing
Skills: Instagram Reels, Short Video Ad, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Bible AI video editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor!
Job details:
Niche: Bible AI
Number of videos: 2-3 per week
Length of videos: 12min-25min
Turnaround: 72 hours

Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.
We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the bible ai niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially):

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
use midjourney
use after FX
Motion graphics
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks
Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for:

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be a resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to midjourney or dalle
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)
Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].
Start your bid with [Insert Random Word; Example: "Banana Milkshake"], so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.
Thanks in advance for your interest

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 29, 2024 16:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Midjourney AI, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Midjourney AI, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Help with potentially corrupted .MOV files - Upwork
item.description:
I have a bunch of old .MOV files from maybe 13 years ago that will not work anymore. I have tried to convert them to other formats, but nothing has worked.

The job here is narrow: I will provide two examples of the files. You spend maybe an hour taking a look at them, and tell me whether they are just corrupted files that can't be salvaged. Or, if they can be converted or otherwise made to work, how?

Budget: $25

item.title: Video Editor (VSL & ADS) - Upwork
item.description:
We have a pre-edited VSL that needs editing from a graphic, pop up, transition, b-roll point of view. the KEY metric we're looking for here are two things:

1. Retention
2. Creativity

This is a 4min and 50sec video sales letter.

I NEED someone creative, that has either edited past VSL's or AD's focused on HIGH retention.

Any q's let me know.

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Brand Strategy Video Reels - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: Social Media Video Editor - Brand Strategy Video Reels

Position: Social Media Video Editor (Brand Strategy Video Reels)

Compensation: $50 per video; potential earnings up to $1,500 per month

Job Type: Contract

About the Role:
We are seeking a skilled Social Media Video Editor with a knack for creating engaging and brand-focused video reels for social media. This role involves producing short, dynamic video ads (60-90 seconds) tailored for small businesses. You will play a crucial role in crafting compelling visual content that aligns with each client's brand strategy and resonates with their target audience.

Responsibilities:

Edit and produce high-quality 60-90 second video reels for social media platforms.
Collaborate with clients to understand their brand vision and goals.
Ensure each video aligns with the client's brand strategy and messaging.
Implement feedback and revisions swiftly and accurately.
Maintain a rapid turnaround time of 48 hours per video.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines consistently.
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, particularly for social media platforms.
Strong understanding of brand strategy and how to convey it through video.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
Portfolio of previous work showcasing your skills in creating engaging social media videos.
Benefits:

Competitive pay of $50 per video with potential monthly earnings of up to $1,500.
Opportunity to work on diverse projects with various small businesses.
Flexible, remote working arrangements.
Potential for long-term collaboration with repeat clients.
If you are a creative and efficient video editor passionate about helping small businesses amplify their brand through captivating video reels, we want to hear from you! Apply today with your portfolio and start making an impact.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 29, 2024 16:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Corporate Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Short Video Ad, Testimonial Video, Adobe Creative Cloud
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Corporate Video, Instagram Reels, Instagram Story, Promotional Video, Real Estate Video, Short Video Ad, Testimonial Video, Adobe Creative Cloud
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Cinematic Real Estate Video Editor & Director - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced cinmeatic real estate video editor with a creative directing mindset.

I'M NOT, looking for someone to put together real estate clips with nice transitions, speed ramping or broll footages,  everyone can do that,

IM LOOKING... for a creative master piece editor with a passion to create stories behind every video you edit.

Real estate videos are becoming saturated with everyone showing off their crazy transitions but only a few are able to tell stories in a  video that stand out

If you  have a passion for editing, telling stories, and a great ear for dynamic and trending music on social media along with the skills to use sound design incoorporated in videos

.... than this is your chance to show me those skills

Required NOTES
- Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
- Experience in color correction and audio editing
- Strong understanding of real estate industry trends and best practices
- Excellent communication skills

**COMMUNICATION** is the most important part for this project and future project,  I dont care if your 14 16 or 20 years old looking to prove your skills to the world, you must communicate wiht me at all times to make our working experience flawless

Please providide me your best real estate video samples on this post and If i like what I see, we will do a a quick second round call interview

Please use the following link to understand the type of work Im looking for
https://studio910pb.com/portfolio/

** Pay attention to the story, the shots, transitions of some of those videos on that page** try to understand the nuances behind the videos more than just the luxury property broll clips put together

For this project, my house is not a luxury houses but the goal is to shoot it as if it was one.

Good luck



Budget: $30
Posted On: June 29, 2024 16:24 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Daily Reel Creator. Same video everyday with new text - Upwork
item.description:
Hi There!

Very easy & funny job here. Looking to hire a longterm reel editor for an Instagram account.

What does the job look like:

You will send a daily edited reel. Video be the same everyday, 1 text change (it’s a updated followers counter)

Initial work:

I will send you an example of what I need & you will just need to edit the initial reel & we will then use the same video looped everyday :)

After initial creation, it will just an updated followers count reel sent over to me so I can post.

I will send clear examples if you’re interested, this is long term and about 10 minutes of work daily.

Please send me your work & im happy to partner long term with one of you. Thank you!


Posted On: June 29, 2024 16:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Dialogue Editing, Video Editing
Skills: Dialogue Editing, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply
